creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Deity, Deities{x

There are nine seperate deities in the world of Akrios. Each one
representing a different alignment and sphere of influence. The deities are
as follows:

{CCaerdik, God of Order - Lawful Good{x
{DNephium, God of Death - Lawful Neutral{x
{RMalyki, God of War - Lawful Evil{x
{WAludra, Goddess of Life - Neutral Good{x
{yTharian, God of Balance - True Neutral{x
{BAdmanthos, God of Magic - Neutral Evil{x
{GSelucia, Goddess of Nature - Chaotic Good{x
{bMyst, Goddess of Mischief - Chaotic Neutral{x
{rSirian, God of Chaos - Chaotic Evil{x

See their helpfiles for more info.
